edu.hm.cs.bikebattle.app.tracker

Class GoogleApiLocationTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.hm.cs.bikebattle.app.tracker.GoogleApiLocationTracker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener, LocationTracker

    public class GoogleApiLocationTracker
extends java.lang.Object
implements LocationTracker, com.google.android.gms.location.LocationListener, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.ConnectionCallbacks, com.google.android.gms.common.api.GoogleApiClient.OnConnectionFailedListener
    Created by Nils B. on 12.04.2016.

    Location tracker using the GoogleAPI Client. Has usually no higher frequency than 5s. Combines network and gps.

        public boolean continueTracking()
        Description copied from interface: LocationTracker
